results.title: Metformin treatment protects mice from glucose-promoted psoriasiform dermatitis through enrichment of Akkermansia muciniphila with modulation of bacterial tryptophan metabolites.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ treatment protects @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ from @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@-promoted @<m>DISEASE_616834</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:616834 @@@psoriasiform dermatitis@@@ through enrichment of @SPECIES_239935 @@@Akkermansia muciniphila@@@ with modulation of bacterial @CHEMICAL_Tryptophan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014364 @@@tryptophan@@@ metabolites.

results.title: Combination therapy of systemic and local metformin improves imiquimod-induced psoriasis-like lesions with type 2 diabetes: the role of AMPK/KGF/STAT3 axis.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVES: We investigated potential therapeutic mechanisms of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@murine@@@ animal model of @<m>DISEASE_616834</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:616834 @@@psoriasiform lesions@@@ in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@.

results.title: Psoriasiform drug eruption associated with metformin hydrochloride: a case report.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin hydrochloride@@@ should be added to the list of drugs that can cause a @<m>DISEASE_616834</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:616834 @@@psoriasiform eruption@@@.

citations.NLM: Koca R, Altinyazar HC, Yenidünya S, Tekin NS. Psoriasiform drug eruption associated with metformin hydrochloride: a case report. Dermatol Online J. 2003 Aug;9(3):11. PMID: 12952758
